description.en: Teleport where you want in Madrigal and return later where the scroll was activated.
description.ar: Teleport where you want in Madrigal and return later where the scroll was activated.
description.br: Teleporta você para o lugar que escolher em Madrigal e depois retorna para o local onde o pergaminho foi ativado.
description.cns: 将你传送到瑞加大陆上任何你想去的地方，然后稍后再传送回使用该卷轴的地方。
description.de: Teleportiert dich zu dem Ort zurück von wo aus du dich in die Stadt teleportiert hast.
description.fi: Teleport where you want in Madrigal and return later where the scroll was activated.
description.fil: Teleport where you want in Madrigal and return later where the scroll was activated.
description.fr: Vous téléporte à l'endroit de votre choix, et vous permet de revenir plus tard à l'endroit où vous avez activé ce parchemin.
description.id: Teleportasi ke tempat yang kamu inginkan di Madrigal dan kembali lagi nanti di tempat gulir diaktifkan.
description.it: Teleport where you want in Madrigal and return later where the scroll was activated.
description.jp: 町への移動した後に、また元の位置へ戻ることができる巻物
description.kr: 원하는 마을로 이동 후 나중에 스크롤이 사용된 이전의 위치로 귀환합니다.
description.nl: Teleport where you want in Madrigal and return later where the scroll was activated.
description.pl: Teleport where you want in Madrigal and return later where the scroll was activated.
description.ru: Teleport where you want in Madrigal and return later where the scroll was activated.
description.sp: Teletranspórtate donde quieras de Madrigal y vuelve más tarde al lugar desde donde activaste el pergamino.
description.sw: Teleport where you want in Madrigal and return later where the scroll was activated.
description.th: เทเลพอร์ตไปยังตำแหน่งที่คุณต้องการใน Madrigal และกลับมาในภายหลังเมื่อเปิดใช้งานคัมภีร์
description.tw: 在瑪德利賈村莊傳送您想要到的地方，然後在激活卷軸的地方返回。
description.vi: Dịch chuyển đến nơi bạn muốn ở Madrigal và quay lại sau khi cuộn giấy được kích hoạt.
